targets.query:
from(bucket: "trading_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "strategy_pnl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_value_usdt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.exchange == "binance")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "trading_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "strategy_pnl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_value_usdt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.exchange == "htx")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "trading_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "strategy_pnl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_value_usdt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.exchange == "binance")
  |> last()

import "math"

current = from(bucket: "trading_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "strategy_pnl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_value_usdt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.exchange == "binance")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

start = from(bucket: "trading_data")
  |> range(start: -24h, stop: -23h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "strategy_pnl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_value_usdt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.exchange == "binance")
  |> first()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

yield(name: "pct_change")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (current._value - start._value) / start._value * 100.0}))

from(bucket: "trading_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "strategy_pnl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_value_usdt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.exchange == "htx")
  |> last()

import "math"

current = from(bucket: "trading_data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "strategy_pnl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_value_usdt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.exchange == "htx")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

start = from(bucket: "trading_data")
  |> range(start: -24h, stop: -23h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "strategy_pnl")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total_value_usdt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.exchange == "htx")
  |> first()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

yield(name: "pct_change")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (current._value - start._value) / start._value * 100.0}))
